    policy_id="daily-snapshots",
    schedule="0 30 1 * * ?",
    name="<daily-snap-{now/d}>",
    repository="my_repository",
    config={
        "indices": [
            "data-*",
            "important"
        ],
        "ignore_unavailable": False,
        "include_global_state": False
    },
    retention={
        "expire_after": "30d",
        "min_count": 5,
        "max_count": 50

)
